name: How it started, how it's going
description:
Video Certificate of Authenticity (VCOA) for, and part of, the multimedia artwork, How it started, how it's going, by Joshua Nierodzinski (Artist) created between 2014-2022. 

After purchasing, you will be provided with a link and code to access the full private video that contains unique and sensitive information.

This (VCOA) is linked to the physical painting and confers ownership to the purchaser, here known as (Collector). By purchasing this NFT, the Collector enters into an Agreement and completely, without exception, agrees to the terms it contains including but not limited to the following:

For Artist
15% royalty on Appreciated Value at resale 
Retention of copyright to Artist
First Right of Refusal
Responsible for maintaining infrastructure, archive, and facilitation, upkeep, or repair in the unlikely event it is needed.

For Collectors:
Physical possession of artwork 
Financial Incentive/Rewards + Special Offers for Collectors.
Responsible for care and initial shipping costs.

Before purchasing  make sure to read full agreement available at nierodzinski.com. 

Description of Video:

The VCOA depicts the layers of the associated painting through visible and multispectral photographic processes: x-ray, infrared, visible, and ultraviolet. It includes the front and back of the painting to confirm scale and display the Oracle of Authenticity (OoA). The OoA includes the artist’s signature, information about the painting, and an NFC tag that when scanned by an NFC-enabled phone will link to a unique archive page with identifying information for tracking.

The video contains sound.
